Question
========

A diagnostic tool for the rare tropical disease Koeles Black Fever (KBF) has sensitivity 0.80 and specificity 0.90. The probability of a traveler contracting the disease is 0.02. What is the probability that someone who the tool says has the disease actually has KBF suffers from KBF?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.14
* 0.50
* 0.72

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.14: Correct
* 0.50: Incorrect
* 0.72: Incorrect
